titles.title: Continuity of Care for Veterans with Chronic Conditions Act

To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase from one month to three months the quantity of supply of certain prescriptions furnished by the Department of Veterans Affairs to veterans with chronic conditions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 5/1/2003--Introduced. Continuity of Care for Veterans With Chronic Conditions Act - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to furnish a veteran by prescription no less than a 90-day supply a medication listed under the Controlled Substances Act if the prescribing physician determines that the veteran: (1) has a chronic condition for which the medication is appropriate; and (2) has not demonstrated any symptoms of abuse of that medication.
